name: Apple iPad Pro 13" M4
image_prompt: Apple iPad Pro 13 inch, space black, Ultra Retina XDR display, thin profile, Apple Pencil Pro attached
description: Thinnest Apple product ever with M4 chip and stunning tandem OLED display. Features 13-inch Ultra Retina XDR, ProMotion 120Hz, Face ID, and Thunderbolt connectivity for pro workflows.

reviews.review_text: The display is unreal. OLED makes everything pop.
M4 handles everything. Replaced my laptop for travel.
Amazing hardware but iPadOS still limits it.
